data.name: A World Abandoned
data.detailed_description:
A World Abandoned is a metroidvania game with a focus on exploration and combat. Use devastating combo attacks to destroy your enemies. Equip abilities and upgrade your stats to build a unique playstyle.
Find permanent upgrades that improve your movement capabilities and let you explore more of the map.
Get to new exciting locations , destroy powerful bosses and uncover the past of the planet.



A spaceship has received an emergency signal from an abandoned planet. Seemingly there is someone left on the planets surface that has been torn apart in a catastrophe a long time ago.
So the spaceship sends down an android known as unit 148 to search for the mysterious survivor.
But there seems to be another reason for the rescue mission...



Join the discord for questions, giving feedback and reporting bugs: https://discord.gg/Xwkghfr

data.short_description: Explore an abandoned planet, find upgrades, build your character and reveal the truth about what happened to the planet and its people.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4700MQ CPU 2.40 GHz, or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4600, or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
